backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with role-based authorization, student applications, user profiles, announcements, homework, routines, class times, and lock-state management with ID counters and storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing admin authorization fix and improved dashboard error handling, referencing involved frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend files including routing, pages, hooks, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles using OKLCH variables for light/dark themes and applies base background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with role-gated routes, layout wrapping for authenticated users, and error boundaries for runtime and routing failures.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Implements global authentication context with session persistence, role helpers, and full query-cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Provides localStorage-backed session utilities for saving, loading, and clearing role and username data.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main application layout with navigation, header, footer, and responsive sidebar, handling logout and role‑based admin access.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Displays a lock or unlock icon with a tooltip indicating lock state, styled based on the `isLocked` value.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Catches runtime errors in child components and renders a fallback UI while logging error details.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Shows a styled error screen with optional error details and a button to reload or reset the error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: Offers queries and mutations for reading and updating master, section, and item-level content lock states via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains query and mutation hooks for student login, applications, approvals, announcements, and other backend data interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light and dark modes, global styles, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for managing applications, users, and lock controls with extensive query and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Simple admin login form with password validation and UI animations.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest class routine with day‑wise tables and lock status indicator.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Manages class time schedules with add, edit, delete dialogs and lock-aware editing controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing announcements, routines, role info, quick access, and admin overviews with lock indicators.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Displays homework entries with add, edit, delete, and locking logic using queries and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Manages announcements with create, update, delete, sorting, and lock-aware UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Shows a pending-approval notice and allows the user to log out back to home.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Presents selectable role cards that navigate users to role-specific login or apply pages.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Provides a student application form, submitting data and showing a confirmation state after success.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Handles student login, routing based on approval status and showing errors for invalid credentials.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Implements simple visitor login via a fixed password with optional password visibility toggle.
frontend/src/utils/adminErrors.ts: Provides helpers to extract readable error messages and detect authorization-related errors using common text patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and layout extensions.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including requirements, issues, architectural notes, and versioning metadata.
